title: Fake Mukesh Ambani Twitter Handle Claims SRK Removed From Jio Ad
subtitle: Shahrukh Khan Removed From Jio Ad Fact Check: A fake Twitter account of  Mukesh Ambani  claimed that he has removed Shahrukh Khan from Jio advertisement.However, a source  told The Quint that it is a fake account.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A fake Twitter account of Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani, which has garnered over 12,000 followers in less than a month, tweeted on 20 June claiming that the industrialist has decided to remove Bollywood actor Shahrukh Khan from Jio advertisement.

However, there are multiple red flags which suggest that the account isn’t Ambani’s. Further, a source privy to the matter confirmed that the account in question is fake and that Ambani is not on Twitter.
